name: DAF Trucks N.V.
goal: DAF Trucks N.V. (DAF) develops, produces and sells trucks and parts under the DAF nameplate for the European market as well as international markets, including South America, Austraila, Africa, Asia and the Middle East. In addition, DAF sells components, engines, axles and cabins to other PACCAR companies and to third party manufacturers of busses, coaches and special vehicels.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Emission norms
Road safety
Vehicle homologation/ type approval standards
ITS connectivity
Urban mobility
